Gym set. Metal padlock with a combination lock. Towel in fast-drying microfibre with a practical eyelet. Elasticated latex bands for resistance training, stretching or rehabilitation. The bands have different levels of resistance depending on their colour. Light green has light resistance (6.6 kg 100% stretched, 14.97 kg 200% stretched), grey has medium resistance (6.24 kg 100% stretched, 18.28 kg 200% stretched) and black has heavy resistance (6.62 kg 100% stretched, 19.05 kg 200% stretched). Size 5x60 cm. Size of towel 30x60 cm.
